Field.Label: In order for your TV to respond to a "Power On" command while in standby mode, we must enable this feature. According to Sharp, power consumption is not significantly increased, but the power light will remain glowing when the TV screen is off in order to indicate it is in standby mode.

Please make sure your TV(s) are powered on and connected before running this command; otherwise the command may fail. Once this is executed you may check the success by turning the TV off and looking for the power light to remain green after the picture has turned off.
This allows sending an arbitrary command to the Sharp television for use in debugging control codes. The code will be sent just as if from the other actions, but with any value typed here.
This function will dump the details of a plugin device to the Indigo Event Log to aid in debugging and forum posts.
